text: Blachia umbellata is a species of plants under the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to India and Sri Lanka. Trees are up to 15m tall.http://www.biotik.org/india/species/b/blacumbe/blacumbe_en.html The plant is known as "Kosatta - කොස් අත්ත or කොසට්ට" by Sinhalese people in Sri Lanka.http://www.instituteofayurveda.org/plants/plants_detail.php?i=483&s;=Family_name ==References== *India Biodiversity Category:Codiaeae Category:Flora of Sri Lanka Category:Flora of Asia Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon Category:Taxa named by Carl Ludwig Willdenow
title: Blachia umbellata
